Doc: A type describing a financial formula, with its description and components.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type describing a financial formula, with its description and components.
 #/
record FpML5.legal.Formula {
  # Text description of the formula
  formulaDescription : string?

  # An element for containing an XML representation of the formula. Defined using xsd:any currently for flexibility in choice of language (MathML, OpenMath)
  math : FpML5.legal.Math?

  # Elements describing the components of the formula. The name attribute points to a value used in the math element. The href attribute points to a value elsewhere in the document
  formulaComponent : FpML5.legal.FormulaComponent?

}

math.Doc: An element for containing an XML representation of the formula. Defined using xsd:any currently for flexibility in choice of language (MathML, OpenMath)
math.Name: math

formulaComponent.Doc: Elements describing the components of the formula. The name attribute points to a value used in the math element. The href attribute points to a value elsewhere in the document
formulaComponent.Name: formulaComponent
